title: Wonton Soup Recipe
description: This wonton soup features homemade Chinese dumplings filled with perfectly seasoned juicy pork and shrimp in a hearty broth with chopped scallions.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Soup Recipes Wonton Soup 4.7 (385) 278 Reviews 62 Photos Wonton soup is a simple, light, Chinese classic with juicy pork and shrimp dumplings in a flavorsome broth. These homemade wontons always add delicious, hearty flavor to any dish! Submitted by MARBALET Updated on February 3, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 62 62 62 62 Prep Time: 30 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Additional Time: 25 mins Total Time: 1 hr 5 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings Wontons: ½ pound boneless pork loin, coarsely chopped 2 ounces peeled shrimp, finely chopped 1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine 1 tablespoon light soy sauce 1 teaspoon brown sugar 1 teaspoon finely chopped green onions 1 teaspoon chopped fresh ginger root 24 (3.5 inch square) wonton wrappers Soup: 3 cups chicken stock 2 tablespoons finely chopped green onions Directions Gather all ingredients. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck To make the wontons: Mix pork, shrimp, rice wine, soy sauce, brown sugar, green onions, and ginger together in a large bowl until well combined. Let stand for 25 to 30 minutes. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck Spoon about 1 teaspoon filling onto the center of a wonton wrapper. Moisten all four wrapper edges with water and fold over filling to make a triangle; press the edges firmly to seal. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck Bring left and right corners together above filling; overlap the tips of these corners, moisten with water, and press together to seal. Repeat until all wrappers have been filled and sealed. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck To make the soup: Bring chicken stock to a rolling boil in a pot. Gently drop in wontons and cook for 5 minutes. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck Ladle into bowls and garnish with green onions. Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck Enjoy! Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck I Made It Print 774 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 195 Calories 6g Fat 21g Carbs 13g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 195 % Daily Value * Total Fat 6g 7% Saturated Fat 2g 9% Cholesterol 44mg 15% Sodium 887mg 39% Total Carbohydrate 21g 7% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Protein 13g 27% Vitamin C 1mg 1% Calcium 30mg 2% Iron 2mg 9% Potassium 195mg 4% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Wonton Soup 01 of 62 Photo by  Allrecipes / Julia Hartbeck 02 of 62 Photo by  LivelyCow1858 01/29/2025 A keeper! Easy to follow This was surprisingly easy, especially once I'd gotten the hang of how to fold the wontons (it was my first time making them in this shape). I think the key to this dish is definitely to get a flavorful stock and then you can doctor it up with even more seasonings if you wish. Will be making this again! 03 of 62 Photo by  UniqueStew2478 01/20/2023 It it really good but it could use a little bit more flavor, but anyone could add that lol 04 of 62 Photo by  maddie 09/05/2021 05 of 62 Photo by  Alyssa Brooke 07/25/2021 06 of 62 Photo by  Erika Filipski 03/08/2021 07 of 62 Photo by  Swit 09/11/2020 08 of 62 Photo by  Audrey Blue 06/29/2020 09 of 62 Photo by  myoldasskitchen 02/08/2020 Great as Is! 10 of 62 Photo by  ancira 07/11/2019 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Chinese Corn Soup 101 Ratings Cock-a-Leekie Soup 84 Ratings Mediterranean Fish Soup 55 Ratings Easy Chickpea Soup 69 Ratings Menudo Rojo (Red Menudo) 68 Ratings Steamed Garlic Prawns, Chinese Style 12 Ratings Butternut Squash-Sweet Potato Ginger Bisque 55 Ratings Ginger-Spiced Cucumbers 20 Ratings Cantonese Style Pork and Shrimp Dumplings 25 Ratings Pork Wonton Soup 42 Ratings Pasta e Fagioli (Pasta and Beans) 552 Ratings Millet-Stuffed Peppers 28 Ratings White Bean Chicken Chili 1,317 Ratings After-the-Holidays Ham Bone Soup 37 Ratings Mango Gazpacho 84 Ratings Loaded Black-Eyed Peas, Spinach, and Vegetable Soup 14 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
